thread.title: Miami Dolphins vs. Tennessee Titans Pick Prediction NFL Pro Football Point Spread Over Under Money Line Betting Odds Preview 10-18-2015
thread.title_full: Miami Dolphins vs. Tennessee Titans Pick Prediction NFL Pro Football Point Spread Over Under Money Line Betting Odds Preview 10-18-2015

author: Tony Tellez
title: Miami Dolphins vs. Tennessee Titans Pick Prediction NFL Pro Football Point Spread Over Under Money Line Betting Odds Preview 10-18-2015
text:
Point Spread Odds: Titans -1 ½ 
Over Under Total: 43 1/2   Titans -125 odds and Dolphins +105 odds. 
Notes: The Dolphins are coming off the bye week. The team fell to 1-3 following the 27-14 home defeat two weeks ago to the New York Jets as a +2 ½ point wagering underdog. The game went under 42 ½ points. The Miami offense struggled by producing just 226 yards with only 59 running. Defensively the Dolphins had no answer for the Jets running back by giving up 207 yards. Miami ranks 31st and second to last in the league in rush and scoring offense. They produce just 69 yards on the ground and 16.2 points per game. 
Tennessee is 1-3 with the 14-13 home defeat last week to the Buffalo Bills as a -1   The game went under 43 points. The Titans lost despite allowing just 209 yards to the Bills offense with 82 passing yardage. Offensively Tennessee could only produce 276 yards. The Titans are third best in the NFL in total defense by allowing just 283 yards per game to their opponents. 
Miami Dolphins versus Tennessee Titans
